ckanext.shibboleth package¶

Submodules¶

ckanext.shibboleth.actions module¶

Overwrite actions for shibboleth to handle extra profile information. Modifications commented with line: # Added in ckanext-shibboleth

ckanext.shibboleth.actions.user_show(context, data_dict)[source]¶

Return a user account and extra profile info.

Minor rewrite to add additional user profile information (acquired eg. from shibboleth) from the user_extra table to the c.user_dict for templates. NOTE: ‘revision_show’ method still references to default ckan.logic.action.get.revision_show while ‘package_show’ declaration is resolved with standard ‘get_action’ hook. Not sure which to use so these are tried.

Either the id or the user_obj parameter must be given in data_dict.

Parameters:
  • id (string) – the id or name of the user (optional)
  • user_obj (user dictionary) – the user dictionary of the user (optional)
Return type:

dictionary
ckanext.shibboleth.actions.user_update(context, data_dict)[source]¶

Update a user account.

Minor rewrite to update also additional user profile information (acquired eg. from shibboleth).

Normal users can only update their own user accounts. Sysadmins can update any user account.

For further parameters see user_create().

Parameters:data_dict[‘id’] (string) – the name or id of the user to update
Returns:the updated user account
Return type:dictionary

ckanext.shibboleth.utils module¶

ckanext.shibboleth.utils.fetch_user_extra(userid)[source]¶

Return extra profile information. More elegant might be to access extra rows through user table foreign key reference. Somehow.

ckanext.shibboleth.utils.shibboleth_user_edit_form_schema(schema)[source]¶

Add more fields to schema for validation.

@param schema: current schema @return: augmented schema

ckanext.shibboleth.utils.user_extra_save(user_dict, context)[source]¶

Save user profile extra information to database. Modified from ckan/lib/dictization/model_save.py:445 (user_dict_save). @param user_dict: dict containing user and extra information @param context: @return: list of saved model objects

Module contents¶

Shibboleth extension for CKAN.

Provides shibboleth authentication for CKAN.
